# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="2638f-102">Emojiksen lisääminen sähköpostiviesteihin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2638f-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2638f-103">Voit lisätä hymiöitä viesteihisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2638f-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2638f-104">Vastaa aiemmin luotuun sähköpostiviestiin tai valitse **Uusi viesti**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2638f-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2638f-105">Valitse **Lisää hymiöt** -painike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2638f-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2638f-106">kirjoitusikkunan alaosassa avataksesi Lausekkeet-ruudun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2638f-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2638f-107">Etsi ja valitse lisättävä emoji tai GIF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2638f-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
